p: Xiong et al. [ 140] investigated the effects of A. sinensis on human endometriotic cells and rats. They observed that A. sinensis extracts significantly decreased inflammation both in vivo and in vitro. After the treatment, the peritoneal levels of TNF-Î± and IL-18 registered significantly lower values and CA-125 decreased. Moreover, it suppressed the expression of MMP-2 and MMP-9.
